articles.title: FULL MOON: Where you can see the last penumbral lunar eclipse of 2020 - 7NEWS.com.au
articles.description: Look to the skies on Monday night and the moon will look very different.
articles.content:
Australians can see a full moon and the last penumbral lunar eclipse of 2020 if they look to the skies on Monday night.
Lunar eclipses can only occur during a full moon, but a penumbral lunar eclips… [+1788 chars]
